sourcesContent:
import { TableContainer, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell } from "@mui/material"; import { useSouqContext } from "../../app/context/SouqContext"; import { currencyFormat } from "../../app/helper/helper"; export default function BasketSummary() { const {basket}=useSouqContext(); // ??0 if null return 0 const subtotal = basket?.items.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+(item.quantity*item.price),0)??0; const deliveryFee = subtotal>1000000?0:5000; const itemCounts=basket?.items.reduce((count,item)=>count+item.quantity,0)??0; return ( <> Total Qty {itemCounts} Subtotal {currencyFormat(subtotal)} Delivery fee* { currencyFormat(deliveryFee)} Delivery fee* { subtotal} Total {currencyFormat(subtotal + deliveryFee)} *Orders over 1000 USD qualify for free delivery
) }
